message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, thanks for your offer.  While I understand your position, the product is worth significantly more than that to me.  Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not able to meet you at $15,000. Can you consider $12,000?
